frontmatter.title: PromptFile Sequences for SaaS Apps

labPresets.initialPrompt: Create a PromptFile sequence that first extracts customer feedback themes, then generates a summary report.

examples: PromptFile: Step 1 — Extract entities from reviews; Step 2 — Summarize results in JSON.
PromptFile: Step 1 — Analyze bug reports; Step 2 — Generate prioritized task list.

quiz.q: True or False: PromptFile sequences allow chaining multiple prompts into workflows.
What is the primary benefit of PromptFile sequences in SaaS apps?
